intro: Christella evoluta, commonly known as the spiral leaf plant, is a species of flowering plant in the family Polygonaceae. It is characterized by its distinctive spiral arrangement of leaves, which gives it its common name. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as woodlands and stream banks. Its leaves are usually lance-shaped and have a smooth, waxy texture. Christella evoluta produces small, greenish flowers that bloom in late spring to early summer.
